article: Yesterday I was tidying up my room. I found  _  old box of my father's .He gave  _  to me two years ago. It was really interesting to discover some of my father's childhood  _  .He once told me  _  he wrote to people all over the world,  _  they sent him  _  ,too. As a result, he had a book of interesting stamps. People also gave him things from different  _  ,such as a silk from Japan, a little doll from England, and a small model ship from Australia. My father even  _  he ticket from his first football match! It made me think about looking  _  my collection of  _  pictures books and magazines.
